entry.tran: (委员会、组织机构的)主席身份，主席任期
entry.def: The chairmanship of a committee or organization is the fact of being its chairperson. Someone's chairmanship can also mean the period during which they are chairperson.

example.ex: The Government has set up a committee under the chairmanship of Professor Roy Goode.
example.tran: 政府设立一个委员会，任命罗伊·古德教授为主席。
